EmailTemplate.name: ACCOUNT CLOSURE
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: Recent ICCU Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
As requested your account with Idaho Central Credit Union has been closed and a check has been issued. Your check is being sent through the U.S. Postal Service Certified Mail. Your tracking number is listed below.
TRACKING NUMBER:
It has been our pleasure to help. If there is anything else we can do, please do not hesitate to contact us. Have a wonderful day!
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Idaho Central Credit Union
P.O. Box 2469
Pocatello, ID 83206
d: (208) 239-3000 | f: (208) 239-3055
